title: Can we do something about Natural Talent?
body:
I mean when TF and every AP champion is taking 2% lifesteal and 2% spellvamp (the stat that gets reduced to about 33% effectiveness when an AoE spell procs it) instead of some scaling AP and AD you know it's a shit mastery.

And trust me Twisted Fate is the champion Natural Talent is the LEAST shitty on and he'd still prefer the vamp.
